name: Fun food
description:
We are happy to welcome all the kids who love games in which you need to cook food and create a variety of delicious dishes. Meet our new game from the series of developing games for children: "Fun food".
And so proceed. Our new game will take your kids to a wonderful world of cooking, in which your child, like a real cook, will create different dishes, prepare desserts and the world's most delicious salads. Here you can prepare food with a wide variety of tastes, add ketchups and mayonnaise, thereby making the dish spicy or sweet, doing everything that a real cook is doing in his wonderful kitchen.
You will find a variety of different and original recipes, following which your kids learn how to cook pizza, tasty salads or a wonderful dessert. And if you really are a fan of culinary masterpieces, then this game is created just for you! Be extremely attentive, learn all the recipes of dishes, fantasize and add new ingredients to the dishes familiar to all, making them original and surprisingly tasty.

Features:
- Unleash your talent as a cook, preparing various dishes.
- A lot of ingredients, additives and condiments to choose from.
- You will prepare pizza, hot dogs, hamburgers and other dishes.
- Animated vegetables will not let your kids get bored.
- Addictive gameplay with developing elements.

Learn and master culinary secrets, create exquisite dishes and become the best chef in the world!


Be sure to visit our website at http://yovogames.com
